#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

long int GCD(long int a,long int b)
    {
    if(a==0||b==0)
        return 0;
    if(b%a==0)
        return a;
    return GCD(b%a,a);
}

int main() {
  int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0)
        {
        long int x1,y1,x2,y2;
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
        x2=abs(x2-x1);
        y2=abs(y2-y1);
        long int gcd=GCD(x2,y2);
        if(gcd==0)
            {
            cout<<0<<endl;
            t--;
            continue;
        }
        x2=x2/gcd;
        y2=y2/gcd;
        long int sum=0;
        sum+=x2+y2-1;
        sum=sum*gcd;
        cout<<sum<<endl;
        t--;
    }
  return 0;
}
